about.title: About Us
about.description: The Center for Modern Educational Technologies at Dagestan State University named after S.M. Omarov (CMET DSU) is the engine of innovation in the education system of DSU. We develop and implement advanced technological solutions, improving the learning experience of students and expanding the methodological capabilities of teachers. Our goal is to build a modern, technology-driven, and effective educational environment.

innovative.title: Innovative Technologies
innovative.full: Integrate cutting-edge technologies in a flexible way to support learning in all formats.

pedagogical.title: Pedagogical Initiatives
pedagogical.full: Encourage the development of advanced educational ideas by integrating them into practice.

interactive.title: Interactive Technologies
interactive.full: Support the integration of modern technologies in the educational process.

digital.title: Digitalization of Education
digital.full: Helping instructors create online courses and bridge the digital divide.

chrono.title: Chronology of the DSU Center
chrono.text: This timeline reflects the key stages of development of the Dagestan State University Center, summarizing its achievements and prospects.
